track.name: So Many Tears
comments: This song gives me chills and it's so deeep :) "and fuck the world cuz i'm cursedd!" Pac is a lyrical lunatic ;D
So many great songs by Tupac! I miss him. RIP Tupac!
I remember cruising with the homeys to this one!
is there a haven for a g,so me sum happyness
always appreciated this man's talent... his book of poetry is slammin
LUUUv this song, one of my PAC favs! love the stevie wonder sample with the harmonica..RIP
what y'all know about this song? my favorite song of all time by pac!
Rest In Paradise Pac. Save me a place at Thugz Mansion.
I been really wantin babies, so I could see a part of me that wasn't always shady....
